hero.title: Visionar.ai
hero.subtitle: AI for Visionaries
hero.description: Let’s build something game-changing — together. You bring the idea. We’ll help you design, train, and scale it.

missionVision.title: Why Visionar.ai?
missionVision.missionText: To empower forward-thinking builders with intelligent tools and expert guidance to bring bold ideas to life.
missionVision.visionText: To be the most trusted AI partner for creators shaping the future of technology, products, and innovation.

offerings.title: What We Offer
offerings.consultingText: Work with our experts to identify how AI can power your vision.
offerings.prototypingText: Rapidly iterate and validate your ideas using smart, scalable tools.
offerings.developmentText: Launch custom software powered by the latest in machine learning.

cta.title: Ready to shape the future?
cta.subtitle: Join creators using Visionar.ai to bring bold ideas to life.
